abstrac: Web development | Mobile App development| SMM |Branding and Design| CMS Development | Ecommerce| Database Development
bio:
Instant Solutions Lab is a creative software firm founded in 2010 in Pembroke Pines, FL.

We focus on making mobile apps and websites by doing simple but effective design and development efficient for small businesses to enterprises. We have thousands of satisfied customers. We've been trusted to build websites and mobile applications for major institutions such as TeacherTube, TriCycleFish, and many more. The average cost of our web design is under $500.

You can rely on us to manage your digital work and updates so that you can focus on running your business. We also take care of your web hosting, security, e-mail, backups, and more.

With over 10 years of collective experience, we are experts in transforming your ideas into intuitive, user-friendly web design and mobile applications.

Tap into ISL to make your best ideas come to life.

Availability:
Our customer service department is available for clients round the clock.
Official working hours are from Monday through Friday 7 AM to 6 PM US EST time.


Development control:
Facility for clients to continually monitor work progress.

Testing Server :
To interact and incorporate modifications, if any.

Payment Terms:
40% as advance
40% delivery of different milestones
20% on end-user acceptance

Meetings:
Our business development team can arrange meetings with you for detailed discussion sessions regarding your project requirements. We are available for visits (Texas), on call conversations, email and instant messaging.

ISL Guarantee:
We provide from 45 days stability period after deployment, for every project we undertake. Any bugs or issues found during this time are fixed free of cost. For more complex projects, stability period can be extended.

bio:
Hello, 

I have been developing web applications for 15+ years. 
I have vast experiences from designing system to publishing onto internet of web applications and experienced/solved too many real-world issues including real-time communication between servers/clients, SPA(Single Page Application) know-hows and handling bulky requests. 

I have full qualifications in following languages/technologies/skillsets: 
- MEAN Stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS and NodeJS) 
- LAMP Stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) 
- PHP & PHP5 (Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symfony, CakePHP, Yii, WordPress) 
- Javascript (jQuery, d3.js, angular.js, knockout.js, React.js) 
-c#, ASP.net, asp.net core, asp.net MVC, asp.net webform, asp.net api
- HTML5&CSS3 
- Hyper-VM controlling 
- database: mysql, mongodb, postgresql, couchdb, Pouchdb

I have vast experiences in following industries/services: 
- Modern fantastic cloud web applications using MEAN/LAMP stack and frontend skills including HTML5&CSS3/jQuery 
- REST API design/implementation/comsumation on web/mobile 
- Integration with social login&signup - Social networking website development 
- Ecommerce integration 
- Rental & booking website development 
- Dating web site development 
- Forum & blog 
- Frontend Design/Backend Management 

I have full experiences in using following tools: 
- Trello 
- Jira 
- Bitbucket 
- Github/GIT 


Thank you very much.

bio:
I'm a motion graphics designer, 2D animator, video editor, graphics designer and e-learning expert with a comprehensive understanding of visual concept production.

I have spent the past 11 years bringing ideas, products, services, and training materials to life using simple (but really effective) animated and still graphics.

My specializations are Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Sparkol Videoscribe, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.

I have gained multitude of experiences working in projects for big companies including:
• Tesco
• LIDL
• Nestle
• Pepsico
• Murphy Pipe and Civil
• Aurizon
• O'brien Groups Australia

Types of works I can provide to you:
• 2D Explainer videos
• Advertising videos
• E-learning videos
• Video Editing
• Lyrics Video
• Whiteboard animation
• intros and outros
• Social media advertisements
• Brochure, visiting cards and leaflets
• Company branding and logo designs
and many more.

I really respect deadlines and I am willing to work overtime sometimes, to provide highest quality for my clients.

I'm looking forward to working with you.
Proficiency and efficiency respecting the deadlines. Work not just for economic earning but also for career building.

abstrac: Web Design | Development | Mobile | Open Source - We pride ourselves in delivering web solutions to our clients that satisfy their business requirements and gain a competitive advantage.
bio:
We are 10+ years into Website Design and Development and have successfully implemented projects in the domains like eCommerce, B2B, B2C, Database driven sites, music site, portals, vortals, coupon site, open source software customization, Oscommerce, Zen Cart, Word Press etc.

Mission

We at E-visualizers aspire to emerge as one of the most innovative companies in India, the ideas and services from whom will give its clients a gratifying and an unimpeachable experience of satisfaction, with a core staff of leading industry specialists working diligently to build the best web solutions in the business. We desire to make "E-visualizers" a strong brand that stands out as a stamp of excellence in the field of web development.

Vision

Our vision is to be guided by ethics, directed by stratagem and driven by innovation.

Code of ethics: We will reach our goal of becoming leading website development firm by building a caring company that is responsible to our clients and our employees.

Our payment terms are as follows: 

50% advance payment to kick off project
30% due upon 80% project completing (Beta Site). 
20% of the final payment due upon completion of project prior to going live on customer server after testing on our development server.

I am an expert in translation - especially for 3 languages: Bahasa Indonesia, English, and Arabic. In details, I have desired literary and writing world, experienced in editing and proofreading (last

abstrac: I will serve more than you need, SATISFACTION-GUARANTEED.
bio:
I am a translator with specialty in 3 languages: English, Arabic, and Bahasa Indonesia. My skill was used to support OIC (Organization of Islamic Countries) Conference which been held in Jakarta, as English-Arabic Translator and Typist.

My background is Sharia Accounting, so I can do some accounting works. My last accounting work is when I became Reconciliation Staff of Accounting Division, at Tiket.com Company, for 2 months in contract (June 2014-August 2014). 

And I'm expert in Fiction Writing - I've experienced in writing some novels, poems, and short stories. My opus, titled by "Kanvas", is still in process of publication. My experience in writing sphere has begun when I became the Editor of SADAR Bulletin (in 2006-2007), so I can do some proofreading, reviewing, and editing work as well.

Hours of operation: Up to client's wish.

Payment term: Negotiable
